about_the_game:
A decade ago, in Bianliang capital, the five precious swords went missing overnight from the bladesmith’s workshop. The bladesmith’s clan, Xuan Yuan, was massacred. Rumor has it that the bladesmith’s youngest daughter survived……

A Jianghu Way of Life


- Step into this chaotic world to unveil the drama behind the five precious swords.
- 20+ side quests to interact with hundreds of historical figures and fictional characters.
- 31 Sects, 20 Gangs and Merchant groups in the vibrant Jianghu landscape.
- Fun anecdotes and errands to build your respect among friends and foes.

Innovative Battle Mechanics


-Thrilling and Tactical turn-based combat.
- 30+ Martial Arts Sects; 13 areas of expertise, including Quan (Boxing), Zhang (Palm), Sword, Heavy Blade, Zhi (Finger), Saber, Staff, Spear, Axe, Whip, Hook, Brush and Anki.
- 2000+ martial combat moves. Challenging AI makes every battle a unique combat experience.
- Use “Mastery Points” to customize your skill set. Create battle combos from endless ways.

The Magnificent Wuxia World


- 1000+ spots allow you to explore freely, including cities, facilities, natures, landmarks, fields, and monuments.
- Clashes between good and evil never end, the world awaits you to explore……

Dynamic Character Progression


- Seek your own lifestyle, collect countless items, and develop your character in cuisine, tea drinking, connoisseurship, Guan Pu gambling, music, poetry, medicine, literature, painting, or even the librarianship of Martial Arts books.
- 12 Merchant Groups control 24 trade routes with their unique Commodities. Engage yourself in futures trading, manipulate secretly when needed, and be a financial prodigy of the Song Dynasty.
- 11 purchasable Manors, in which each Room offers a different, fun gameplay; make friends, host feasts, and enjoy the best moments in the Jianghu world.

Lifelike Interactions


- Each character has their own “Personality”, “Value”, “Romantic Preference”, and “Sexual Orientation”.
- Each NPC has their “Network”. It is your choice to become their friend or foe.
- Everything you do will affect how NPCs react to you.
- Our interaction system including stealing, poisoning, competing, flirting etc. Making a good meal can improve your relationship with an NPC but learning someone else’s Martial Arts moves without permission can result in a deadly duel.

The “Tianshu Record”


- The Tianshu Record is a catalog where you can store useful information for multiple playthroughs.
- 800+ collectible elements, including plot characters, Martial Arts books, cuisines, literature, manors, etc.

Lifelike Interactions


- Each character has their own “Personality”, “Value”, “Romantic Preference”, and “Sexual Orientation”.
- Each NPC has their “Network”. It is your choice to become their friend or foe.
- Everything you do will affect how NPCs react to you.
- Our interaction system including stealing, poisoning, competing, flirting etc.

The Prestigious “Tianshu” Tournament


- North and South: Heroes compete from two geographical divisions separated by the Huai River.
- Preliminaries: Sects and merchant groups send their representatives to compete for tickets to enter the Final Duel.
- The Final Duel: Fight for Supremacy and the ultimate Honor.

The Smart JackonAI system


- 1000+ Random generated AI including disciples, travelers, or literati. Data-driven AI powers NPC actions.
- NPC has their own distinctive lives and hobbies.
- NPC’s personality can affect their martial preference and combat strategies.
- Your avatar can be mirrored and recreated into another player’s opponent in the 1V1 battle campaign.

name: 江湖十一

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX980M
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: Jianghu11 is an open-world cultivation RPG set in the wuxia world. In this game, you will create your own character or start as a fictional or historical figure. Explore the fascinating wuxia world with enormous NPCs, search for romance, and write your own legend.
